# thetalake_analysis (Data Source)

Theta Lake Analysis Data Source. Retrieves information about an analysis result.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "thetalake_analysis" "example" {
  id = "123"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Analysis ID

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp
- `details` (String) Analysis details
- `name` (String) Analysis Name
- `status` (String) Analysis Status
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp
